channel.title: Need base client
channel.description: I'm trying to get better at coding and get more into it. I got a base server that was recommended by one of the moderators. Does anyone have any base clients that I could use to begin coding. I'm looking for something that would be fairly decent for a beginner-intermediate coder. If you could please give me a link or even just a name I would be very grateful. THANKS!!! :D

item.title: Need base client
